title: CII - resolve no_leaked_credentials
author: sparerd
body_snippet:
This is to track resolution of CII requirement `no_leaked_credentials`
> The public repositories MUST NOT leak a valid private credential (e.g., a working password or private key) that is intended to limit public access. 

This requirement is broken because we use a default password for encryption unless a user provides a custom one. To resolve this, we must require a user defined password for encryption.

Possible related enhancements include:
- #187 
- #255

comments.snippet: Using encryption based on the Windows User instead of the generic key would also improve this a little...
comments.author: simonai1254
